Section.name: About Vignan University
Section.description:
Vignan University Vadlamudi Guntur is a Deemed to be university established in the year 2009. The institute was brought to life under the visionary guidance of the Vignan Educational Trust. Vignan University has been accredited with a Grade ‘A+’ by NAAC and holds the approval from UGC, AICTE & NBA. Further, the university is affiliated with JNTU Hyderabad, Kakinada and Anantapur and holds ISO 9001:2000 certification.
The university offers various courses at UG, PG & PhD levels in the fields of Engineering, Science and Management. Admission to these courses at Vignan University Guntur is done based on V-SAT (Vignan's Scholastic Aptitude Test) & V-JET (Vignan's Joint Entrance Test) at the university level. The university also accepts state-level & national-level examinations for admission such as TS ICET, AP/TS EAMCET, JEE Main, CAT, MAT, GATE, NET and more.
Guntur Vignana University is well known for its dedicated faculty, state-of-the-art infrastructure and excellent placement record. 40% of the faculty at Vignan Guntur is from IIT, IISC & NIT and faculty to student ratio stands at 1:20.
Table of Content

Vignan's Foundation for Science, Technology and Research (Deemed to be University) is located in Vadlamudi, Guntur. The university is well-connected with roadways, airways, and railways to foster travelling.
Ques. Is Vignan Guntur a good option?
Ans. Vignan University is a better option compared to other deemed to be universities for pursuing higher education, especially in the fields of Science & Technology. The university is well-accredited and approved by UGC & AICTE. The university also holds A+ grade by NAAC and is ranked 5th amongst the best universities in rural India. The university holds good placement records with many students being placed with top-notch companies like Cognizant, Wipro, Accenture, TCS & HCL.
Ques. Which is better – Vignan University or KL University?
Ans. Here are some insights on Vignan University & KL University to know which is better among the two.
Ques. Does Vignan University provide scholarship schemes?
Ans. Yes, scholarship schemes are offered to candidates applying to the University. 25% of the total intake is allotted to candidates through scholarship schemes. For several courses, it is done on a first come first serve basis. Candidates will have to maintain a minimum of 70% in all years of the course to avail scholarships.
Ques. What is V-SAT?
Ans. The V-SAT exam consists of the subjects Mathematics, Biology, Physics, Chemistry, English and Aptitude tests. The examination is computer based and consists of 120 MCQs. There is no negative marking for this particular examination.
Ques. What was the highest CTC offered at Vignan University?
Ans. The highest CTC offered at Vignan University is INR 44 LPA. The Placement cell at Vignan University provides opportunities to students and by providing assistance for industry internships and final placements. Aptitude tests and mock interviews are arranged by the placement cell for training the students.
Ques. How to contact Vignan University for queries?
Ans. To contact Vignan University for queries, refer to the information given below:

Ques. How much is hostel fee at Vignan University?
Ans. The hostel fees at Vignan University are as follows:
Ques. How much is the Vignan University Guntur Fees?
Ans. Vignan University Guntur Fees range from INR 60,000 to INR 3,60,000 Per Annum (Tuition Fee) depending upon the course chosen.
Ques. What is Vignan University Guntur phone number?
Ans. 0863 234 4700 is the primary contact no for Vignan University.
